import{useEffect,useMemo,useState}from"react";import Calculator from"./Calculator";import ToggleSounds from"./ToggleSounds";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function formatTime(date){return new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en",{month:"short",year:"2-digit",hour:"2-digit",minute:"2-digit",second:"2-digit"}).format(date);}function App(){const[allowSound,setAllowSound]=useState(true);const[time,setTime]=useState(formatTime(new Date()));// Will be be AM or PM
